scripts.pdf: (killall -9 node || echo 'Process was not running.') && reveal-md slides.md --theme ../assets/theme/qt-dark.css --listing-template listing.html --scripts script.js--print slides.pdf
scripts.dev: (killall -9 node || echo 'Process was not running.') && reveal-md . -w --theme ../assets/theme/qt-dark.css --listing-template listing.html --scripts script.js
